name: Linguaquote
tag_list: translation, translators, translation-buying, linguists, languages, translation-portal, linguist-search, find-a-linguist
overview:
Sortable quotes and contact with association member translators.

Linguaquote allows buyers to find the translator they need, with the expertise and price they require, all from a pool of highly qualified and association vetted linguists.

All Linguaquote translators are members of their local national translation association, each with very stringent membership requirements and accountability terms. This gives the translation buyer a high degree of quality assurance from the start - a feature unique to Linguaquote.

If the buyer opts to work with a translation agency, these are all ISO-certified for quality assurance in their workflow.

Buyers are free to build relationships with any number of linguists or agencies at no cost, and with no subscription; the site is supported by its linguists and member agencies.
